title: InitializeActionCommandBACnetReal (Method)
text:
METHOD InitializeActionCommandBACnetReal
Initialized a BACnet-ActionCommand, which writes a BACnet-Real/Double value to another BACnet-Object-Property. The initialized command then
normally is used as part of a BACnet-ActionList.

rows.Name: devInst
rows.Comment: The instance number of the targeted BACnet device.

rows:
The instance number of the targeted BACnet object under the
BACnet device.

The type of the targeted BACnet object under the BACnet
device.

The property ID of the targetedn property under the BACnet
object.

The priority used to write the BinaryPV value to the
targeted property.
The post delay after writing the BinaryPV value.

Whether the action list execution shall be quited on failure
of this action command or not.

rows.Name: bacReal
rows.Comment: The real value to be written.

rows: The action command structure to be filled.
